categories.name: Dogs
categories.description: Everything your canine companion needs, from food and treats to toys and accessories.

categories.name: Cats
categories.description: Quality products for your feline friends, including food, toys, scratching posts, and grooming supplies.

categories.name: Birds
categories.description: Cages, perches, food, and toys for your feathered companions.

categories.name: Small Pets
categories.description: Products for hamsters, guinea pigs, rabbits, and other small animals.

categories.name: Fish
categories.description: Aquariums, filters, food, and decorations for your aquatic pets.

products.name: Premium Dry Dog Food
products.description: High-quality dog food made with real meat and vegetables. Provides complete nutrition for adult dogs of all breeds.
products.details: Our Premium Dry Dog Food is crafted with care using real chicken as the first ingredient. It contains no artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors. Rich in protein and essential nutrients, this food helps maintain healthy muscles and provides energy for an active lifestyle. Suitable for adult dogs of all breeds and sizes.
features: Real chicken as the first ingredient
Rich in protein and essential nutrients
Promotes a shiny coat and healthy skin

specifications.Ingredients: Chicken, Brown Rice, Peas, Carrots, Flaxseed, Vitamins & Minerals

products.name: Adjustable Dog Collar
products.description: Durable and comfortable nylon collar with secure buckle. Available in multiple sizes and colors.
products.details: Our Adjustable Dog Collar is made from high-quality nylon webbing that stands up to daily use. The secure quick-release buckle makes it easy to put on and take off, while the D-ring provides a secure attachment point for your dog's leash and ID tags. The collar is adjustable to ensure a perfect fit for your furry friend.
features: D-ring for ID tags and leash attachment

products.name: Interactive Dog Toy
products.description: Engaging toy that dispenses treats as your dog plays. Perfect for mental stimulation and exercise.
products.details: The Interactive Dog Toy is designed to keep your dog mentally stimulated and physically active. As your dog pushes and rolls the toy, it dispenses treats, rewarding them for their play. The adjustable difficulty level allows you to customize the challenge based on your dog's skill level.
features: Suitable for dogs of all sizes

products.name: Premium Cat Food
products.description: Nutritionally complete formula for adult cats. Made with real meat and essential nutrients.
products.details: Our Premium Cat Food is formulated to meet the specific nutritional needs of adult cats. Made with real chicken as the first ingredient, it provides the high-quality protein cats need. The balanced blend of vitamins, minerals, and taurine supports overall health, including heart function, vision, and immune system.
features: Real chicken as the first ingredient
Enriched with taurine for heart and eye health

specifications.Ingredients: Chicken, Brown Rice, Corn, Fish Oil, Taurine, Vitamins & Minerals

products.name: Deluxe Cat Scratching Post
products.description: Multi-level scratching post with platforms and toys. Perfect for scratching, climbing, and playing.
products.details: The Deluxe Cat Scratching Post gives your feline friend a designated place to exercise their natural scratching instinct, saving your furniture. The sturdy base prevents tipping, while the soft plush covering on the platforms provides a comfortable place for cats to rest. Dangling toys add an element of play to engage your cat's hunting instinct.

specifications.Materials: Sisal rope, plush fabric, particle board

products.name: Interactive Cat Toy Set
products.description: Set of 5 engaging toys including feathers, mice, and balls. Perfect for keeping your cat active and entertained.
products.details: This Interactive Cat Toy Set includes a variety of toys designed to stimulate your cat's natural hunting instincts. The set includes feather teasers, plush mice with catnip, and balls with bells. These toys encourage physical activity, provide mental stimulation, and help prevent boredom.

specifications.Contents: 2 feather toys, 2 plush mice, 1 bell ball
specifications.Suitable for: Cats and kittens of all ages

products.name: Large Bird Cage
products.description: Spacious cage for medium to large birds with multiple perches, feeding stations, and easy-clean design.
products.details: Our Large Bird Cage provides a spacious and comfortable home for your feathered friend. The cage includes multiple perches at different heights, allowing your bird to move around naturally. The slide-out tray makes cleaning easy, while secure locks keep your bird safely inside. The cage comes with feeding cups and a swing for enrichment.
features: Feeding cups and water dispenser included

specifications.Includes: 2 wooden perches, 2 feeding cups, 1 swing, slide-out tray

products.name: Premium Bird Seed Mix
products.description: High-quality seed mix specially formulated for parakeets, cockatiels, and other small birds.
products.details: Our Premium Bird Seed Mix is specially formulated to provide optimal nutrition for small to medium birds. The balanced blend includes a variety of seeds, grains, and dried fruits to ensure your bird receives all the nutrients they need. The resealable bag keeps the seeds fresh longer.
features: Balanced blend of seeds and grains

specifications.Ingredients: Millet, sunflower seeds, oats, dried fruits, vitamins & minerals

products.name: Hamster Cage Kit
products.description: Complete habitat for hamsters including cage, wheel, water bottle, and food dish.
products.details: The Hamster Cage Kit provides everything you need to create a comfortable home for your hamster. The spacious cage allows plenty of room for exercise and exploration. The kit includes an exercise wheel, water bottle, food dish, and hideaway, giving your hamster all the essentials for a happy life.
features: Water bottle and food dish included

specifications.Includes: Cage, exercise wheel, water bottle, food dish, hideaway
specifications.Suitable for: Hamsters, gerbils, and other small rodents

products.name: Deluxe Hamster Exercise Wheel
products.description: Silent spinner wheel for hamsters, gerbils, and mice. Provides essential exercise while minimizing noise.
products.details: The Deluxe Hamster Exercise Wheel features a unique design that allows your small pet to run without making the annoying squeaking sounds often associated with exercise wheels. The solid running surface prevents legs from getting caught, making it safer than wire wheels. The wheel attaches securely to the cage for stability during use.

products.name: 20-Gallon Aquarium Kit
products.description: Complete aquarium setup including tank, filter, hood with LED lights, and water conditioner.
products.details: The 20-Gallon Aquarium Kit includes everything you need to start your own underwater world. The clear glass tank provides an excellent view of your fish, while the powerful filtration system keeps the water clean and healthy. The LED hood illuminates your aquarium with energy-efficient lights that showcase your fish and plants.

specifications.Filter Type: Power filter with biological, mechanical, and chemical filtration

products.name: Quality Tropical Fish Food
products.description: Nutritionally complete flake food for tropical freshwater fish. Enhances color and supports health.
products.details: Our Quality Tropical Fish Food provides balanced nutrition for all tropical freshwater fish. The specialized formula enhances the natural colors of your fish while supporting their overall health and vitality. The flakes are designed to float initially, then slowly sink, allowing fish at all levels to feed.

specifications.Ingredients: Fish meal, shrimp meal, wheat flour, algae meal, vitamins & minerals
